name: min-webapp
description: Minimum boilerplate of isomorphic web application

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run bundle
scripts.watch:bundle: mkdir -p bundle && watchify -e lib/client/app1.js -e lib/client/app2.js  -p [ factor-bundle -o bundle/app1.js -o bundle/app2.js ] -p [ css-modulesify -o bundle/style.css -d ./lib/share ] -t babelify --extension jsx -o bundle/common.js -v
scripts.bundle: mkdir -p bundle && browserify -e lib/client/app1.js -e lib/client/app2.js -p [ factor-bundle -o bundle/app1.js -o bundle/app2.js ] -p [ css-modulesify -o bundle/style.css -d ./lib/share ] -t babelify --extension jsx -o bundle/common.js -v
